titles.title: A resolution designating the first week in August 2017 as "World Breastfeeding Week", and designating August 2017 as "National Breastfeeding Month".
A resolution designating the first week in August 2017 as "World Breastfeeding Week", and designating August 2017 as "National Breastfeeding Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates the first week of August 2017 as World Breastfeeding Week and designates August 2017 as National Breastfeeding Month.
Expresses support for policies and funding to ensure that all mothers who choose to breastfeed can access a full range of support.
